title: Patient Tracker System
subtitle: Healthcare Management Platform
description: A comprehensive healthcare management system with three dashboards (Doctor, Patient, Admin) featuring secure authentication and robust data management.

caseStudy.problem: Healthcare facilities need secure, efficient systems to manage patient data while maintaining strict privacy and access controls for different user roles.
caseStudy.solution: Developed a three-tier dashboard system with role-based access control, implementing secure authentication, data encryption, and comprehensive patient tracking features.
features: Three separate dashboards: Doctor, Patient, and Admin
Secure authentication with session management and SQL injection prevention
Forgot password functionality with email verification
caseStudy.learned: This project taught me advanced PHP security practices, including proper session handling, SQL injection prevention, and password hashing. I learned about design patterns like Singleton for database connections and Observer for notifications. The documentation process (SRS/SDD) gave me experience in professional software development methodologies.

title: Ransomware Attack Simulation
subtitle: Incident Response & Security Analysis
description: Simulated ransomware attack with full incident response workflow, encryption algorithms, and security analysis.

caseStudy.problem: Organizations need to understand ransomware threats and have effective incident response plans, but real-world testing is dangerous and unethical.
caseStudy.solution: Created a safe, controlled simulation environment to demonstrate ransomware attack vectors, encryption methods, and implement the full 7-phase incident response plan.
features: Simulated ransomware with AES, DES, and RSA encryption
Hash cracking demonstration for password security education
Safe environment for learning attack/defense strategies
caseStudy.learned: This project deepened my understanding of cryptographic algorithms and their practical implementations. I gained hands-on experience with incident response procedures and learned how different encryption methods work in real attack scenarios. The project also taught me about ethical considerations in security testing.

title: E-commerce Bookstore
subtitle: Full-Stack Online Retail Platform
description: Complete online bookstore with user authentication, product catalog, shopping cart, and secure payment integration.

caseStudy.problem: Small bookstores need affordable, customizable online presence with secure transaction handling and inventory management.
caseStudy.solution: Built a full-stack e-commerce platform with secure user authentication, product management, shopping cart functionality, and order processing system.
features: Secure user authentication with hashed passwords
Product catalog with search and filtering capabilities
Shopping cart with persistent session storage
Responsive design for mobile and desktop
caseStudy.learned: This project gave me comprehensive experience with the MERN stack (MongoDB, Express, React, Node.js). I learned about REST API design, database schema planning for e-commerce, and implementing secure authentication. The project also taught me about state management in web applications and handling user sessions securely.

title: Maze Runner Solver
subtitle: Pathfinding Algorithm Visualization
description: Interactive maze solver visualizing A*, BFS, and DFS algorithms with real-time pathfinding visualization.

caseStudy.problem: Students learning algorithms struggle to visualize how pathfinding algorithms work in practice and compare their efficiency.
caseStudy.solution: Created an interactive GUI application that visualizes maze solving using three different algorithms (A*, BFS, DFS) with real-time animation and performance metrics.
features: Real-time visualization of A*, BFS, and DFS algorithms
Customizable maze generation with different difficulty levels
caseStudy.learned: This project helped me deeply understand graph traversal algorithms and their practical applications. I learned about GUI development with Tkinter and how to visualize complex algorithms in an accessible way. The project also taught me about algorithm efficiency analysis and how to make technical concepts understandable through visualization.

title: Word Frequency Counter
subtitle: Text Analysis with Sentiment API
description: Advanced text analysis tool with word frequency counting and sentiment analysis integration.

caseStudy.problem: Text analysis tools often lack integrated sentiment analysis and have poor user interfaces for non-technical users.
caseStudy.solution: Developed a user-friendly GUI application that combines word frequency analysis with sentiment analysis API integration for comprehensive text processing.
features: Word frequency counting using custom HashMap implementation
Sentiment analysis integration via external APIs
Graphical user interface built with Qt framework

title: Taxi Booking System
subtitle: Transportation Management System
description: Console-based taxi booking management system with linked list data structures for efficient operations.

caseStudy.problem: Small taxi companies need simple, efficient software to manage bookings without complex database systems.
caseStudy.solution: Built a console-based booking system using linked lists for efficient data management, focusing on core operations like booking, cancellation, and driver assignment.
features: Efficient booking management using linked lists
Fare calculation based on distance and time

title: Hotel Management System
subtitle: Object-Oriented Hospitality Solution
description: GUI-based hotel management system implementing OOP principles for room booking and guest management.

caseStudy.problem: Small hotels need affordable management software that handles reservations, billing, and guest information efficiently.
caseStudy.solution: Developed a comprehensive hotel management system using Java and JavaFX, implementing object-oriented design patterns for maintainability and scalability.

title: Automated Grading System
subtitle: Educational Assessment Platform
description: System for uploading questions, submitting answers, and generating instant grades with efficiency improvements.

caseStudy.problem: Educators spend excessive time grading assignments manually, leading to delays in student feedback.
caseStudy.solution: Created an automated grading system that allows instructors to upload questions and answer keys, then automatically grades student submissions with instant feedback.
features: Question and answer key upload functionality
